message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CC

This paper deals with the task of inferring networks of substitutable and complementary products using text data from product reviews. This task involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques, which are commonly studied in the sub-categories of Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper also makes use of features such as ratings, specifications, prices, and brands, which are relevant to the sub-categories of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) and Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.CC). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories for this paper are cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SI, and cs.CC, in that order.
